description.value:
You need thieves' tools to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Pick a Lock]{Pick Locks} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Disable Device]{Disable Devices} (of some types) using the Thievery skill.

If your thieves' tools are broken, you can repair them by replacing the lock picks with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks)]{Replacement Picks} appropriate to your tools; this doesn't require using the Repair action. If you wear your thievesâ€™ tools, you can draw and replace them as part of the action that uses them.
